title: CondaError: CondaHTTPError: HTTP 000 CONNECTION FAILED for url <https://conda.anaconda.org/soumith/linux-64/pytorch-0.2.0-py35hb1547bd_4cu80.tar.bz2>
body_html:
(py35) user@user-ASUS:~$ conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith
Fetching package metadata .................
Solving package specifications: .

mkl:         2017.0.3-0               https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free
